LanguageData.OE_Ghoul_KineticDrive.label: kinetic drive
LanguageData.OE_Ghoul_KineticDrive.description: This creature's blood is saturated with volatile stimulants and synthetic adrenaline, greatly enhancing its speed and combat reflexes, at the cost of rising metabolic strain.
LanguageData.OE_Ghoul_BastionDrive.label: bastion drive
LanguageData.OE_Ghoul_BastionDrive.description: This creature's blood is saturated with protective catalysts and biochemical shields, hardening its body against injury and fire, at the cost of rising metabolic strain.
